For Pekah <S%H6492><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Remaliah <S%H7425><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> all of them valiant <S%H2428><s%> men; <S%H1121><s%> because they had forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

At that time <S%H6256><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> to help him. <S%H5826><s%>
